short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on October 6th, 2022 by 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
description: The contractor is required to supply, deliver and install a new blast cabinet and media recovery system to be installed on the shop floor to replace the output and damaged blast cabinet.
duration_in_months: Doentations may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
